subject: Re: Graphic Design Work
body:
Hi James, you're welcome!!!We prepared the DebianArt site. Please look now:http://art.debian.netThanks!2007/4/18, James Herrington <
james.herrington@tiscali.co.uk>:

Hi,I am a young graphic/web designer and am looking to gain some high profileexperience for my portfolio. I have heard from other debian mailing liststhat some graphic design work is currently going into the debian desktop. Is
there any suitable work for someone with my experience?Regards,James--To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to 
debian-desktop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
-- Andre Luiz Rodrigues Ferreira (si0ux) <
andrelrf@gmail.com> *******************************************************************Orlandia - SP - Brazil
